monsters.name: Regret Plagued
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Syphon
traits.desc: If 2 or more Regret Plagued are within 5 feet of an enemy, and both at a minimum of 1 hit point at the start of the round, they regain 5 hit points each, and the enemy becomes frightened.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The Regret Plagued can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Regret Plagued makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one grappled creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) psychic damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the psychic damage taken, and the Regret Plagued regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the Regret Plagued can grapple the target (escape DC 13).
